modal.title: Modal Command Palette
modal.description: Whether the command palette should be modal or in the left panel.

maxRecentCommands.title: Maximum Recent Commands
maxRecentCommands.description: The maximum number of recently executed commands to show at the top of the command palette. Set to 0 to disable recent commands.

selectFirstByDefault.title: Select First Item by Default
selectFirstByDefault.description: Whether to automatically select the first item in the command palette when it opens.
